artist: Engraver: Alessandro Sala; Delineator: After Lattanzio Gambara
description: two images printed on single sheet; Left: soldier seated with lance(?) in thigh; soldier without helmet kneeling at left; five helmeted soldiers and 2 men with wreaths on head behind right: group of women with two children; one child standing and one child being held by woman right foreground
